name: Puzzle Expedition
description: Puzzle Expedition is unique puzzle game which focuses on the cooperation of two characters, Anna and Ben, who help each other to get out of the labyrinth. Help them to succeed in their quest!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 1.6GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible card or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2000 MB available space
